STUDY your MAP and EXIT ROUTES

1. MEMORIZE your MAP of streets, building, paths INSIDE OUT

2. Create 3 routes for going back home safely ( Best to worst ): Draw, , rehearse it MENTALLY and with your group, if any.

You have NO TIME to study during emergency.
YOUR PREP and HARD WORK will pay off !!!!



THINK CRITICALLY ON EACH ACTION !!!
